verses.verse: <S%H3213>Wail,<s%> fir <S%H1265>tree,<s%> for the <S%H730>cedar<s%> has <S%H5307>fallen,<s%> because the <S%H117>stately<s%> ones are <S%H7703>destroyed.<s%> <S%H3213>Wail,<s%> you <S%H437>oaks<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> for the <S%H1208>strong<s%> <S%H3293>forest<s%> has come <S%H3381>down.<s%>

A <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3215>wailing<s%> of the <S%H7462>shepherds!<s%> For their <S%H155>glory<s%> is <S%H7703>destroyed:<s%> a <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H7581>roaring<s%> of young <S%H3715>lions!<s%> For the <S%H1347>pride<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> is <S%H7703>ruined.<s%>

Their <S%H7069>buyers<s%> <S%H2026>slaughter<s%> <S%H816>them,<s%> and go unpunished. Those who <S%H4376>sell<s%> them <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H1288><s%> 'Blessed be <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> for I am <S%H6238>rich;<s%>' and their own <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> <S%H2550>don't<s%> pity them.

For I will no more <S%H2550>pity<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%>" <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> <S%H4672>"but,<s%> behold, I will deliver the <S%H120>men<s%> <S%H376>everyone<s%> into his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>'s <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of his <S%H4428>king.<s%> They will <S%H3807>strike<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> and out of their <S%H3027>hand<s%> I will not deliver <S%H5337>them.<s%>"

So I <S%H7462>fed<s%> the <S%H6629>flock<s%> of <S%H2028>slaughter,<s%> <S%H3651>especially<s%> the <S%H6041>oppressed<s%> of the <S%H6629>flock.<s%> I <S%H3947>took<s%> for myself <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4731>staffs.<s%> The <S%H259>one<s%> I <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H5278>"Favor,<s%>" and the <S%H259>other<s%> I <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H2254>"Union,<s%>" and I <S%H7462>fed<s%> the <S%H6629>flock.<s%>

I cut <S%H3582>off<s%> the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3391>month;<s%> for my <S%H5315>soul<s%> was <S%H7114>weary<s%> of <S%H5315>them,<s%> and their soul also loathed <S%H973>me.<s%>

Then I <S%H559>said,<s%> "I will not <S%H7462>feed<s%> <S%H4191>you.<s%> That which dies, let it <S%H4191>die;<s%> and that which is to be cut <S%H3582>off,<s%> let it be cut <S%H3582>off;<s%> and let those who are <S%H7604>left<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H802>each<s%> <S%H7468>other<s%>'s <S%H1320>flesh.<s%>"

I <S%H3947>took<s%> my <S%H4731>staff<s%> <S%H5278>Favor,<s%> and cut it <S%H1438>apart,<s%> that I might <S%H6565>break<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> that I had <S%H3772>made<s%> with all the <S%H5971>peoples.<s%>

It was <S%H6565>broken<s%> in that <S%H3117>day;<s%> and thus the <S%H6041>poor<s%> of the <S%H6629>flock<s%> that <S%H8104>listened<s%> to me <S%H3045>knew<s%> that it was the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

I <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5869>them,<s%> "If you think it <S%H3051>best,<s%> give me my <S%H7939>wages;<s%> and if <S%H2308>not,<s%> keep <S%H8254>them.<s%>" So they weighed for my <S%H7939>wages<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> pieces of <S%H3701>silver.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7993>me,<s%> "Throw it to the <S%H3335>potter,<s%> the <S%H145>handsome<s%> <S%H3366>price<s%> that I was valued <S%H3365>at<s%> by <S%H3947>them!<s%>" I took the <S%H7970>thirty<s%> pieces of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and <S%H7993>threw<s%> them to the <S%H3335>potter,<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

Then I cut <S%H1438>apart<s%> my <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H4731>staff,<s%> even <S%H2254>Union,<s%> that I might <S%H6565>break<s%> the <S%H264>brotherhood<s%> between <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3947>me,<s%> "Take for yourself yet again the <S%H3627>equipment<s%> of a <S%H196>foolish<s%> <S%H7462>shepherd.<s%>

<S%H6965>For,<s%> behold, I will raise up a <S%H7462>shepherd<s%> in the <S%H776>land,<s%> who will not <S%H6485>visit<s%> those who are cut <S%H3582>off,<s%> neither will <S%H1245>seek<s%> those who are <S%H5289>scattered,<s%> nor <S%H7495>heal<s%> that which is <S%H7665>broken,<s%> nor <S%H3557>feed<s%> that which is <S%H5324>sound;<s%> but he will <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of the <S%H1277>fat<s%> <S%H6561>sheep,<s%> and will tear their <S%H6541>hoofs<s%> in <S%H6561>pieces.<s%>

<S%H1945>Woe<s%> to the <S%H457>worthless<s%> <S%H7473>shepherd<s%> who <S%H5800>leaves<s%> the <S%H6629>flock!<s%> The <S%H2719>sword<s%> will be on his <S%H2220>arm,<s%> and on his <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H5869>eye.<s%> His <S%H2220>arm<s%> will be <S%H3001>completely<s%> <S%H3001>withered,<s%> and his <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H5869>eye<s%> will be <S%H3543>totally<s%> <S%H3543>blinded!<s%>"
